It's important to read and accept donation rules before deciding to contribute to our project.
Please visit our Forum for more information.

Instructions
1. Register on our website using a valid email address.
2. Visit our e-shop and chose the amount of 'Premium Points' you would like to receive.
3. Complete the purchase procedure.
4. After the payment is received and verified we'll send you a Gift Code in an emaill address or as a private message on the website.
5. The last step is to go to Dwarven Loyalist NPC in Dwarven Village and type in your code. Please remember to type the code in exactly as you see it.
6. All code redeption attempts are loged and anyone found guessing codes will be banned.
It may take up to 24 hours to deliver your code.

Your contributions help us to stay online and grow. Thank you for supporting Dwarven Manufacture! :)
